pullrequest.title: Upload coverage reports to Codecov from Pipelines

content.raw:
It looks like the failure is in this command:

`lcov: WARNING: negative counts found in tracefile coverage.info`

So the `.cleaned` file is never generated and the following command fails with:

`genhtml: ERROR: cannot read file coverage.info.cleaned!`

ign-math had the same issue for a while but it was solved changing the image from `gcc:6.1` to `ubuntu:xenial` and installing `build-essential`. But here we're already doing that.
content.html:
It looks like the failure is in this command:

lcov: WARNING: negative counts found in tracefile coverage.info

So the .cleaned file is never generated and the following command fails with:

genhtml: ERROR: cannot read file coverage.info.cleaned!

ign-math had the same issue for a while but it was solved changing the image from gcc:6.1 to ubuntu:xenial and installing build-essential. But here we're already doing that.
